SELECT COUNT(*) as counter FROM plugin_push_schedule tasks LEFT JOIN devices ON devices.id=tasks.deviceId LEFT JOIN groups ON groups.id=tasks.groupId LEFT JOIN configurations ON configurations.id=tasks.configurationId WHERE tasks.customerId = #{customerId}
AND ( tasks.messageType ILIKE #{messageFilter} OR tasks.payload ILIKE #{messageFilter} OR tasks.comment ILIKE #{messageFilter} OR devices.number ILIKE #{messageFilter} OR groups.name ILIKE #{messageFilter} OR configurations.name ILIKE #{messageFilter} )
